name: Exercise #2 - Rocket
description:
2nd Task by Ironhack's UX/UI Designer Course:


STORY TIME:


Without exaggerating, it took me over 5 hours just to make this rocket. I wasn't sure if I had to use only circles, like previously practiced. I had to stop working on this because of frustration of not figuring out how to redo some previous steps done. Therefore, I continued through the next 2 exercises little by little, to see if the solutions could come up.


Eventually it did! I'm so proud of myself! üíõ It may seem like a 'simple' rocket. But, for me it is way more than that. I see HOPE for myself.


I used to be an elementary teacher in these subjects: P.E., Special Ed., Science, Religion, Math, and Language Arts. Why am I mentioning this? Well, because my designing methods were skilled in a different way. I used to decorate and express my thoughts with anything you can find at a school.


I only used technology for the basics: social media, video games, and for school. I never saw myself using the technology like this.


Like it? Give it a ‚ù§Ô∏èüòÅ
